meanings.definition: People who have been given a guarantee or assurance.
meanings.sent1: The assureds were relieved to know that their investment was safe.
meanings.sent2: The assureds received a written guarantee of their safety.
meanings.sent3: The assureds joked that they were the most assured group in town.
meanings.sent4: In the game of life, the assureds held the winning ticket.
meanings.sent5: The assureds stood tall, knowing they were protected.

meanings.definition: The individuals who are insured under an insurance policy.
meanings.sent1: All the assureds were covered by the same insurance company.
meanings.sent2: The assureds filed a claim after the accident.
meanings.sent3: The assureds playfully argued about who had the best insurance coverage.
meanings.sent4: Like a shield, insurance protects the assureds from financial harm.
meanings.sent5: The assureds felt secure knowing their policy was in place.
